mapper.insert: insert into IMPORTANTBOARD (I_ID, I_TITLE, I_CONTENT, I_EMP_ID, I_DATE) values(iboard.nextval, #{I_TITLE}, #{I_CONTENT},#{I_EMP_ID} , sysdate)
mapper.select: select I_ID, I_TITLE, I_CONTENT, I_EMP_ID, I_DATE, I_HIT from IMPORTANTBOARD where I_ID = #{I_ID}
mapper.update: update IMPORTANTBOARD set I_TITLE = #{I_TITLE}, I_CONTENT =#{I_CONTENT} where I_ID = #{I_ID}
